title: Flora's fortune The second part and finishing of the Fisher-mans tale. Containing, the strange accidentes which chaunced to Flora, and her supposed father Thirsis: also the happie meeting with her desired Cassander. By F.S.
author: Sabie, Francis.
publisher: By Richard Ihones, at the signe of the Rose and Crowne, neere to S. Andrewes Church in Holborne,
notes: The completion of a verse paraphrase of: Greene, Robert. Pandosto.
Also possibly intended to be issued with his: Pans pipe.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
